description.brief: Some useful ROS nodes for the Nao humanoid robot.
description.p: The nao stack contains some useful ROS nodes for the Nao humanoid robot, developed at the Humanoid Robots Lab at the Albert-Ludwigs-Unversitaet in Freiburg, Germany. It provides joystick teleoperation, odometry, joint state, and a basic robot model for Nao. The humanoid_navigation stack contains some more general packages for humanoid / biped robots.
Files are available at http://code.google.com/p/alufr-ros-pkg/, documentation at http://www.ros.org/wiki/nao.
